Detailed Description

Parse INDS into graphviz DOT language graph via CGI Now broken into two phases: Phase one, via indsInterface, fetches all the information from INDS via HTTP and builds a dot-language graph from it.

Phase two, via dotProcessor, saves the graph to a temporary file and runs the dot binary to generate SVG.

Author:
Paul Hubbard pfhubbar@ucsd.edu
Date:
1/7/09
Todo:

Note:
